short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture X(Twitter) live comments and sync them as scrolling overlay on live video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Core Features

1. Converts X platform's live comments into danmaku (bullet screen) style

2. Comments float across the live video as scrolling captions

3. Users can toggle the danmaku display on/off at any time

Why Install It?

1. Enhanced Viewing Experience: Transforms traditional comments into an interactive danmaku format

2. Easy Control: Simple on/off toggle buttons

3. Lightweight Design: Minimal impact on browser performance
